content.text:
Mr. MENENDEZ. Mr. President, I was unavailable for rollcall 
vote No. 266, on the nomination of Peter B. Robb, of Vermont, to be 
general counsel of the National Labor Relations Board. Had I been 
present, I would have voted nay.
  Mr. President, I was unavailable for rollcall vote No. 267, on the 
motion to invoke cloture on William L. Wehrum, of Delaware, to be an 
Assistant Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency. Had I 
been present, I would have voted nay.
content.speaker: Mr. MENENDEZ
